item.title: Using Wrong-Way Driving Detection Data to Identify Factors That Affect Wrong-Way Driving Behavior and Compare Detection Technologies
TRB 2022: Advancing Safety Through Traffic Law Enforcement
item.description: This presentation was sponsored by the Standing Committee on Traffic Law Enforcement (ACS30). Its associated paper number was TRBAM-22-01574.

item.title: TRB 2022: Freeway and Regional Transportation Systems and Operations 2022
item.description: This presentation was sponsored by the Standing Committee on Freeway Operations (ACP20) and Standing Committee on Regional Transportation Systems Management and Operations (ACP10). Its associated paper number was TRBAM-22-01598. Note that although I was not the lead author, I presented the poster due to the main author being unable to attend.

item.title: Using context classification to develop intersection Safety Performance Functions: national survey of current practices and evaluation of benefits for rural Florida intersections
Evaluating the benefits of using a context classification system to develop intersection safety performance functions
Regional Perspective of Safety Performance Functions and Their Application to Florida Intersections in Suburban Residential and Urban General Context Classification Categories
TRB 2021: Regional Transportation Systems Management and Operations 2021
item.description: This presentation was sponsored by the Standing Committee on Regional Transportation Systems Management and Operations (ACP10). Its associated paper number was TRBAM-21-00078.

item.title: Statewide Application of Wrong-Way Driving Crash Risk Modeling and Countermeasures Optimization Algorithm to Identify Optimal Locations for Countermeasure Deployment on Florida Limited Access Facilities
Developing context-specific safety performance functions for Florida intersections to more accurately predict intersection crashes
